item.title: Starbucks to lay off hundreds of workers, close stores in North America
item.description: Coffee giant Starbucks will lay off workers and close stores as part of a $1 billion restructuring plan, CEO Brian Niccol said in a memo to employees ...

item.title: WATCH: Driver jumps raised bridge during police chase
item.description: A scene from an action movie played out in real life during a police chase in Seattle, authorities said, with the suspect in a stolen car jumping the ...

item.title: ICE facilities on higher alert after deadly Dallas shooting, director says
item.description: Acting Immigration and Customs Enforcement Director Todd Lyons said he would put all ICE facilities on a higher alert following a shooting at a Dallas...

item.title: WATCH: Floodwaters crash into Hong Kong restaurant
item.description: Security footage captured the moment floodwaters crashed into a Hong Kong restaurant on Wednesday as a result of Super Typhoon Ragasa.

item.title: WATCH: Squirrel falls from the sky onto car, and survives
item.description: The critter appeared unharmed and was able to hop off moments later.
